column4: i am not getting the app name autocomplete feature on the gnome-terminal
will it work everytime i log in, or do i have to enter that command?
you'll have to run that command for every logon - to do that automatically - you'll need to put that command in your ~/.bashrc file
probably but you don't want to do that -- you could backport the package tho
i believe ubuntu already has that setup .. it's just a matter of logging out and logging back in
i dont know.. intrepid doesn't seem to have it.
File/Connect To Server - choose SSH there
i need to make a share on my computer and connect to it from a mac.
through ssh right?  just install the openssh-server package
i'm not sure how you mount a remote share on Mac OS X .. but I guess there's a mac channel somewhere if you don't know how.
you shouldn't need to install anything on the Mac, i don't think.  just figure out how to use ssh on it.
